page.title: 08LEISURE TIME IN BROMSGROVE-2
page.content: {BOYS' BRIGADE}- The Boys' Brigade is divided into 2 sections, one for 6-9 year-olds, the other for boys over 9. The kinds of activities you can do are games, first aid and camping, and trips are organised too. At the end of each year badges and certificates are awarded to those who have done well in the activities. {SNOOKER}- In Bromsgrove there is a snooker hall called Rekoons. If you want to play there you have to be 16 or over. It is open every day of the week. The club is going to ask the council if they can have children's competitions. {PARK GATE INN}- This pub is just outside Bromsgrove, on the Kidder- minster Road. It has a children's park, so parents can have a drink while their children play safely.
